snippet: Campaigning for Gambia’s March 29 parliamentary elections began on Wednesday, with President Yahya Jammeh’s party facing no opposition for more than half of the seats.
abstract: Campaigning for Gambia’s parliamentary elections begins, with President Yahya Jammeh’s party facing no opposition for more than half of the seats.
lead_paragraph: Campaigning for Gambia’s March 29 parliamentary elections began on Wednesday, with President Yahya Jammeh’s party facing no opposition for more than half of the seats.

headline.main: Gambia: Ruling Party Faces Scarce Opposition for Parliament
headline.print_headline: Gambia: As Race Begins, Ruling Party Faces Scarce Opposition for Parliament
